pinyin: san1 ge4 nu:3 ren2 yi1 ge4 xu1

definition: three women are enough for a drama (idiom)
pinyin: san1 ge5 nu:3 ren2 yi1 tai2 xi4
nan2 ren2 bu4 huai4 , nu:3 ren2 bu4 ai4

sentences.english: The woman behind me, whoever she is, whispers about sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 我後面的女人，不知道是誰，悄聲說着鎮靜藥。

sentences.english: During Hellenistic times, Greek women also started to artificially wave and curl their hair.
sentences.chinese: 在希臘化時代期間，希臘女人就已開始人爲地捲髮了。

sentences.english: Women do phonological processing with both their right and left inferior frontal gyri .
sentences.chinese: 女人是利用她們左右眉骨後的側腦回發音的。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他不能毫無必要地娶那個老女人。

sentences.english: It is research that is guaranteed to delight men - and infuriate the women in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究結果一定會讓男人高興，惹女人生氣。

sentences.english: Being a woman is synonymous with being a second-class citizen, in her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，做女人是做二等公民的同義詞。

sentences.english: The image of the woman popped into his head out of the blue.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人的形象突然出現在他的腦海裏。

sentences.english: Women get off on judging each other, especially their very own friends.
sentences.chinese: 女人天性心愛品論他人，特別是評論自己的好朋友。

sentences.english: If women are clean water, the ones who have fallen in love time after time are footbath water.
sentences.chinese: 如果說女人是水，那麼戀愛多次的女人就象洗腳水。

sentences.english: If women are clean water, the ones who have fallen in love time after time are footbath water.
sentences.chinese: 如果說女人是水，那麼戀愛多次的女人就象洗腳水。

sentences.english: Reasons for higher success rates among women are difficult to isolate.
sentences.chinese: 女人高成功率的原因很難去單獨分析出。

sentences.english: Woman is the daughter of rich family, literature, everything terrible.
sentences.chinese: 女人是大戶人家的女兒，琴棋書畫樣樣了得。

sentences.english: One woman said she had scribbled "California" on her paper.
sentences.chinese: 一個女人說她在紙上草草寫了“加州”這個詞。

sentences.english: The guy's depraved…Gets off on violating and humiliating all these women.
sentences.chinese: 這人夠墮落最喜歡侵犯和羞辱這些女人。

sentences.english: She is a pretty and coquettish woman.
sentences.chinese: 她是個妖冶女人，要離她遠些。

sentences.english: "She is what I would call a fine-looking woman, " I said, after a judicial pause.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個我會稱爲長相好看的女人。
